items: Nest label:Bold Italic
Underline: <u>Before software can be reusable, it first has to be usable.</u>
Deleteline: <del>Good code is its own best documentation.</del>
The trouble with the world is that <del size=30 lineColor=#FF0000 color=#0000FF>the stupid are sure</del> and <u size=30 color=#FF0000 lineColor=#00FF00>the intelligent are full of doubt. </u>

If debugging is the process of removing bugs,

then programming must be the process of putting them in.
